item.title: I Wanna Maker
item.description:
About This Game

I Wanna Maker is a precision platformer with a robust level editor and online level sharing, based on I Wanna Be The Guy fangames.

Create complex levels using a wide variety of objects, a powerful events system, and customizable visuals. Browse levels online, traverse a hand-crafted campaign, take on challenge modes, and more!

Level Editor Features

  • Intuitive but powerful level editor with 70+ objects
  • A flexible events system which enables endless possibilities
  • Dozens of visuals for blocks, spikes, and backgrounds, each color-customizable
  • 150+ songs to choose from
  • Props, lights, and particles to visually enhance your levels
  • Add optional objectives to your levels with collectible gems

Gameplay Features

  • Play 240,000+ user-created levels made for a variety of skill levels
  • Speedrun leaderboards for each level with watchable replays
  • Campaign mode with dozens of high-quality levels
  • Incredibly precise and responsive controls
  • Take on challenge modes consisting of randomly chosen levels
  • Save levels to custom playlists and share them online
  • Follow your favorite makers so you don't miss their new levels
  • Customize your character's appearance

No monetization

I Wanna Maker is free to play, with no monetization of any kind. We hope you enjoy making levels and participating in the community!

item.title: Dungeons 4
item.description:
About This Game

Once upon a time in a realm far, far away, everything was lush and green. The unicorns mingled among the trees and the elves and humans lived peacefully in harmony with their surroundings. Yet somewhere at the edge of a clearing half-hidden among the trees, obscured by a rising veil of fog in the hazy half-darkness of a weather-beaten hut, a shape huddles over a large and ominously glowing crystal ball. A mumbling voice sings ancient formulae, urging the swirling glowing mists inside the crystal to part and give an insight into the future.

“All is in flux, nothing seems certain. Come, oh vagaries of space and time, separate the veil and show us what is yet to come”, the voice grumbles with the hint of an eye faintly reflecting the glow in front of its hood. The shape’s audience, only barely visible in the dim light, leans in closer and listens intently. “Time ebbs and flows, forming pools and wrinkles… but when the mists part only vague images rise from beyond the veil. Shhhh—don’t come too close, you don’t want to disturb my delicate magical weavings do you?” The shape, still bent over the orb, mutters and shoos the other back a bit more into the shadows. “Ah, now it seems to be clearing a little. I can see… something… several somethings, hints of voices echoing in the haze. A baby, something happening on Hill Doom and the coming together of the Council of Snots – what could all this mean?”

In a flash, the light reflected in the eye turns red and a distant evil laughter echoes through the woods. Stay tuned for the return of the Soothsaying Evil!



The Absolute Evil and its trusted *cough* servant, the Dark Elf Thalya, return in Dungeons 4 after the events of its fabulous predecessor to bring about their triumph over the forces of good once more.

Build a cozy and comfortable Dungeon to suit your creatures’ needs and rule over them, then send them out into the Overworld to kindly remind the good people living there that the Absolute Evil rules over their lands. Gather your Evilness in new and dynamic ways and unleash it upon the lush green forests and plains of the Overworld to turn them over to the dark side. But make sure that your Dungeon is well-secured by traps and defended by your creatures, for those pesky Overworlders won’t just twiddle their thumbs while you turn their land into the Absolute Evil’s most pleasurable holiday paradise.

But what is that noise? “Gold, gold, gold and gems, gold and gems and gold!” The ancient song echoes throughout the underworld, accompanied by the clanging steel of hammers and axes. The Dwarves have arrived to claim their share of the abundant resources and together with the Elves and Humans of the Overworld, they send out their raiding parties to find the Dungeon’s heart.

Dungeons 4 keeps the spirit of its predecessor, but everything is now bigger, better, and with even more dynamic Evilness™.



Everything is better with Dwarves™: The Dwarves have arrived to build their underground strongholds and the hardy little fellows (although they don’t like being called that) compete with the Ever-Expanding Evil for space and resources.


It makes your Dungeon great again: Dungeons are up to four times larger than before and there are many more creatures who wait for the All-Commanding Evil’s orders to conquer the Overworld. Now the time has come for massive armies and truly sprawling dungeons!


Ripe for the taking: The Overworld is bigger than ever before. Gain Evilness by beating Mini Bosses like the obsessively harmonious Unicorn and use it to transform the Overworld into stunning biomes of pure evil.


New and shiny: An ability-based Perk system for Thalya, the Absolute Evil’s trusted *cough* and most loyal subordinate, grants her impressive new powers. The Absolute Evil can now enjoy taking over the world, governing the creatures and slapping subordinates even more with the customizable Evil Hand.


Minions, everywhere: The Horde, the Undead and the Demons wait to do the Absolute Evil’s bidding, with more creatures than ever eagerly following the gesturing Evil’s orders, and Snots will play a much more prominent role this time.


Many ways to tell the story: A long campaign, narrated by the beloved English Narrator from previous titles, as well as several skirmish maps all to challenge your rule as the Absolute Evil.


Change the world: Spread your Evilness across the Overworld to bring lush and green environments over to the dark side, now shining even more vibrantly and beautifully evil as you spread your evilness across many new biomes.


Work together, slay together: 2-player co-op multiplayer with both players managing one Dungeon together. All maps from the skirmish mode and the campaign are playable in co-op.

item.title: Append
item.description:
About This Game



Append is a 2D top-down arena shooter with online multiplayer. Play as a futuristic hovering space train in a dilapidated space station, fighting other trains over who gets to scavenge the station or something, whatever. The reason is not important. Your roof-mounted cannon can be upgraded by collecting power-ups, which are stored inside your train cars - watch out so the enemy trains don't destroy them!

Shoot the enemies to shrink them, and to snipe their abilities. Go super offensive and obliterate everything, or put everything on defense. Choose your own strategy!

HUNDREDS OF WEAPONS

Collect power-ups and combine them into hundreds of unique combinations, all useful in different scenarios and situations. There are also many passive abilities that help you defend or attack more efficiently. Each ability can be upgraded to increase its power.

Applicative powers

With applicative powers you can add a debuff to your enemies. These interact in expected ways, fire burns over time, water puts fire out, but also makes electricity spread, snow makes the enemy slower and so on. With each level, the debuff becomes stronger or longer lasting.


                          

Multiplicative powers

If you want to shoot more bullets, you can use a multiplicative power. There are multiple variants of these depending on whether you want precision or mayhem. With increasing levels the rate of fire becomes higher.


                          

Impacting powers

When your bullets hit something, impacting powers make them do something. They can bounce, explode, or even go through walls. With each level, the impact becomes more prominent.


                          

Movement powers

You can also affect the movement of your bullets, like making them faster, chase enemies, or slow down and become a mine. If you combine the mine with other powers, you can even create defense turrets. The movement becomes more pronounced as you get higher levels of the power.


                          

Passive powers

There are also lots of passive powers that improve your chances of winning, like faster movement, healing, luck, and segments that shoot back at incoming projectiles. These powers also amplify when you get higher levels.


                          

Mystery boxes

Sometimes you will come across a mystery box, where you get to choose from 3 power-ups. If you have collected the luck powerup, you will have a higher chance of getting rare power-ups from the box. This allows you to tailor your arsenal to the opposition, and upgrade to insane levels of destruction.


                          

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Challenge your friends or strangers online, no local server or host required. Each room can fit up to ten players so you can invite all your friends. Create private rooms or allow strangers to join.

If you don't have enough friends you can also play against bots with varying difficulty.


                          

MULTIPLE GAME MODES

You can play free-for-all where everyone tries to kill everyone, or team up against each other, for instance humans vs bots.

There is more than one way to win the game. The goal can be to grow as long as possible, to kill as many enemies as possible, or to just shoot as many bullets as possible.


                          

FEATURES

  • Multiple game modes (Free-for-all, Co-op, etc).
  • Configurable goals (Longest train, most kills, etc).
  • Online multiplayer without need for server, host, or firewall config.
  • Play with your friends or create and join games with strangers.
  • Supports mouse/keyboard or controller.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Procedurally generated arenas.
  • Easy to mod.

May the best train win, or survive or whatever. Yay!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2437110/Append/

item.title: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape 2
item.description:
About This Game

🏥 In the heart of "Doctor Psycho's Hospital", you find yourself trapped in a horrible nightmare, a captive of your own tormented mind. The hospital that was once just a mirror in your mind is now a living hell — a place where your deepest secrets and darkest fears have come true.



⚡️Your goal is crystal clear: confront your inner demons, find the hidden items and keys within the hospital's ominous walls and make your way to unlock the escape door that holds your only path to freedom. Escape is your only salvation, but the road is full of danger.

🪓 The survival depends on your stealth, survival skill and quick actions as you navigate the strange halls of a dangerous hospital, when every step you take could be your last.



😈 Search for stuff, avoiding the evil Dr. Psycho and his psychopathic patients, Crazy Butcher and Sewer Clown. Explore the deepest psyche of your character as they face a terrifying and overwhelming nightmare twisted to life. Embrace shadows and hide in unusual places like under beds, closets, toilet stalls to avoid unwanted attention.



💡 Can you conquer your inner demons and discover the secrets of this place, freeing yourself from the clutches of the Doctor's Psycho Hospital?
The line between sanity and madness is blurred as you navigate the dangerous realms of your nightmares.

🤯 Your mind and freedom hang in the balance. Good luck.

item.title: Favela Zombie Shooter
item.description:
About This Game

Get ready for a heart-pounding, action-packed zombie shooting game set in a Brazilian favela. In "Favela Zombie Shooter," you'll face wave after wave of different zombies and have to survive as long as you can.

Gameplay:
Wave-Based Survival: Brace yourself for relentless waves of the living dead. You must stand your ground and fight off waves of zombies, each with their own unique behaviors and abilities.

Zombie Types:
To survive, you'll need to adapt to the different zombie types. Slow-moving zombies lumber towards you, but their sheer numbers can overwhelm. Runners sprint at breakneck speed, making them difficult targets. Scratchers, when close, they attack quickly and inflict serious damage. Heavy zombies are nearly impervious to gunfire and require tactical thinking to bring down.

Upgrade System:
To stay alive, you'll need better weapons. You can earn money in the game and use it to buy stronger guns to help you survive.

Features:
- Fun and intense zombie shooting action.
- Different types of zombies to fight.
- Buy better weapons to survive longer.
- Four different maps to survive in.
- Realistic graphics and beautiful environments.

In "Favela Zombie Shooter," you'll need quick reflexes and powerful weapons to survive the zombie onslaught. Can you make it out alive from the favela filled with zombies?

item.title: Blue Maiden
item.description:
About This Game

Blue Maiden is a Japanese first person psychological horror game that focuses on exploring and finding answers to the mystery of the old neighborhood.

Story


You are Tachi Tachibana, a graduated university student, after graduating you decide to return to your neighborhood to help at the family business, you have been dreaming the same nightmare in which you find a mysterious girl, when You finally arrive in your neighborhood, you notice that something is not right, and you must find out what is happening.

Features


Most of the time you have to walk and explore different traditional Japanese locations to find clues and solve the mystery of the Blue Maiden.

  • Immersive Experience: An Atmospheric Graphics.
  • Japanese Theme: Environment inspired by Japanese horror games.
  • Psychological horror: The game contains some jumpscares that could be disturbing.

item.title: Elves of Duty
item.description:
About This Game

Compete with friends or team up to deliver the most gifts

Chaotic platforming. Fast paced PvP combat. Diverse arenas filled with traps and hazards.
A thrilling experience that will surely (maybe, but probably not) ruin friendships.

Features

  • 2 Game Modes - Delivery and Brawl
  • 14 Arena Levels
  • 13 Unique Power-ups
  • 2-4 Player Local Multiplayer (Controllers are required for each player in local multiplayer)

Deploy an Arsenal of Ridiculous Power-ups


Fireball - Fast. Reliable. Just don't miss.


Hammer Swirl - Big tools for tiny hands. Nailed it.


Cluster Duck - Quack, Quack, BOOM


...and many more!

item.title: Balance Helicopter
item.description:
About This Game

Balance the helicopter using its two engines!

17 levels with difficult obsticles!

Short game with +2 hours of gameplay.

item.title: Ludde
item.description:
About This Game



Explore a charming winter world with Ludde and discover various exciting, challenging, and fun activities for all ages!

Have fun with snow

Roll big snowballs to create a snowman, snow shovel the yard, have a snowball fight with the neighbors, ice fish, practice slapshots in hockey, rent a snowmobile or put on your skis and ski down the mountain. All of this and much more is possible in Ludde.

Be rewarded with golden dog bones

100 golden dog bones connected to 100 different activities to discover and collect. When you have gathered enough bones you'll have access to more items and eventually, you have proven yourself ready to face the evil threat that endangers the peace of Ludde's village.

If you like collectibles then you are in luck. Keep your eye out for coins, chewable pinecones, bulletin boards, and clams, or use your camera to take pictures of snow fairies.

Move fast with vehicles and gear

Rentable snowmobiles (including flyable ones) can be found everywhere, but you can also buy your own or use your skis. If you find hot air balloons, you can use them as fast travel points and fast travel there at any time.

Key features

  • Explore a picturesque winter world and play around with snow
  • Discover 100 fun and varied activities spread across the world
  • Focus on what you enjoy: explore your surroundings at your own pace and choose which activities you wish to complete
  • Move around fast by using snowmobiles, skis, your wingsuit, or hot air balloons
  • Thanks to the pick-up-and-play concept and multiple difficulty settings, the game is equally enjoyable for all ages

item.title: HotBunz
item.description:
About This Game

Premise


In a world where twerking is the only way to be respected in society, HotBunz is a game about how a new sport, the Bootylympics, allows the citizens of Buttopia to rise above the ranks by being as crass and show-boaty as they can.

The rules of the Bootylympics are as quirky as the Buttopians themselves. Participants must navigate through a series of challenges that showcase their ability to shimmy, shake, and twirl with unmatched finesse. From synchronized booty bouncing to gravity-defying farting, every move is meticulously judged by a panel of esteemed cheek connoisseurs.

Play as your favorite Buttopian in this physics-based 2D Platformer Party Game with your friends and claim all the glory. Always remember, Champion Buttopians always come dressed to kill.


- Play Solo to collect as many coins and buy character skins
- Play against friends in different game modes to really show them who's who
- Fart Fire (Pretty cool, we know)
- Dress your Buttopian up to show up and show off!
- Most Importantly, HAVE FUN!

Game Modes

Solo

Navigate through varying obstacle courses to collect keys and gold coins in a series of increasingly complex levels.

VS (King Of The Hill)

Everybody's your enemy, claim the flag and hold on to it for as long as you can while dodging those other loser Buttopians

Co-Op (Capture The Flag)

Play with a team member against an opposing team by capturing as many of their flags as you can.




Controls XBOX


A - Fart
B - SuperFart
RT - Grapple
LT - Steal Key From Player
L Analog - Movement

Keyboard


WASD - Movement
R Shift - Grapple
Space Bar - Fart
Next level - Space Bar

item.title: Family Arcade
item.description:
About This Game

'Tis the season to be gaming 🎄

Looking for a way to make your next game night or family gathering even more fun? Look no further than Family Arcade.
Our jam-packed collection is the ultimate stress reliever, guaranteed to bring out your inner child and have you laughing all night long.

Make your holiday season unforgettable with our selection of games that are sure to get everyone into the Christmas spirit 🎅

Our games are perfect for all ages and skill levels, so everyone can join in on the fun. From classic party games to the latest hits, Family Arcade has something for everyone:

🎲 Scavenger Hunt is tailored for young minds.
🎲 Pop the Pumpkin is a great game for teens who are looking for a fun and more challenging experience.
🎲 Hyperdrive is crafted for mature players seeking an adrenaline-fueled experience.
🎲 Wordsmith is designed to appeal to seniors who are looking for a fun and mentally stimulating activity.

In addition to our wide selection of Christmas games, our Home screen also features over an hour of Christmas songs to get everyone in the holiday mood!

Perfect for family game nights or solo holiday cheer, this pack will bring hours of fun and nostalgia to your home!

item.title: Cat On The Desktop
item.description:
About This Game

Game Content
  • Cats with 10 different skin types.
  • Hang up and interact with your mouse operation.

Game Controls
Double click on the cat's head to pop up a menu; Can set whether to interact or not; Whether to place at the top; Switch skin.

item.title: Nightscape City
item.description:
About This Game




Improve your club with various items. Place objects on Isometric Grid based plane.

  • Speakers
  • Mixers
  • Counters
  • Lights
  • Dance Tubes
  • Furnitures
  • Walls
  • Seperators
  • Floors




Increase the luxury level of your club to satisfy your customers. Design your club with fancy dance floor, different types of lights, build rooms and declare as VIP. Sometimes there may be fights, sometimes people may not like the type of music. Some people prefer techno music but some prefer trance. You can also upload your own music to music playlist. It's your job to take care of all this.




Hire or fire an employees to manage your club. Higher skill requires higher management skill. Your customers want quality service.





Unlock various drinks. Some people wants exclusive cocktails, some of them want expensive.

  • Juice
  • Beer
  • Coctail
  • Wine
  • Tequila
  • Rum
  • Vodka
  • Gin
  • Whiskey





Prepare unforgettable nights for your customers by organizing special events. Increase your popularity with concept parties.

item.title: CodeX
item.description:
About This Game

CodeX is an atmospheric adventure game that doesn't have any hints, in-game marker, quest log or savepoint.

The story is told through Environmental Storytelling and the player has to find out for himself how to progress by using or moving objects and solving small puzzles.

The game is developed by a very small Indie Developer on Unreal Engine 5.

Features


  • Environmental Storytelling
  • Thrilling Story
  • Atmospheric Gameplay
  • No Savepoint
  • No In-Game Marker How To Progress

item.title: The Legend of Ogorets #3: Kikimora
item.description:
About This Game

You are aboard a ship headed straight for the center of the galaxy. The Legend of Ogorets is a series featuring mature, action-packed, character-driven adventures in post-apocalyptic settings. Your choices matter. #3 is the adventure of Kikimora, a mutant creature tortured inside her own home wherever she rests for longer than a little whilst on a migratory path to escape danger she found inside a prison society. The only problem is, everywhere is dangerous for her. Average read time: 50-60 minutes. Some readers may find this content disturbing.

item.title: Infected: Outpost
item.description:
About This Game

SUMMARY


INFECTED: OUTPOST is a 2-12 player social deduction horror game inspired by The Thing, which will test your wits and teamwork. You and your friends are stranded and must work together to escape. However, one of you is infected, and they can shapeshift into their victims. Gather resources, uncover the traitor, and race against time for a thrilling and heart-pounding experience. Will you work together to survive, or will you succumb to the infection?

PLAYERS AND NPCs


Each map has a set number of characters. Each character is controlled by either a player or an NPC. To blend in with the NPCs, remember that they walk in straight lines, and cannot run or pick up items.

HOW TO WIN


HUMANS
DISINFECTION: Kill the infected player.
ESCAPE: At least one human player escapes the outpost. Each extract has different requirements for fuel, keys, and maps.


INFECTED
ASSIMILATION: Kill all human players.
GENERATOR SHUTDOWN: The generator timer reaches zero and the humans freeze to death and the infected wins. Prevent the humans from increasing the time by refueling the generator.

TIPS


- The Infected is an alien threat that shapeshifts into its victims.
- The only way to tell if someone is infected is if they cannot shoot the gun.
- The Infected cannot attack while holding an item.
- Items such as keys, flares, fuel, and weapons are randomly placed in chests across the map.
- When you run, your footsteps will be heard. NPCs don't run. Try to blend in.
- When you die, you can spectate the game. Use A and D to switch between players.
- We recommend using any VOIP program to communicate with other players.

RULES


- Don't talk when you're dead.

FUTURE CONTENT

Even after the release of Infected: Outpost, we plan to add even more content to the game, but this will only be possible with enough support from you guys <3
- The return of proximity chat.
- More game modes.
- More maps based on other classic horror films (Alien, The Descent, I Am Legend, and more!) with their own unique items, objectives, and twists on the gameplay.
- Randomized skills and weaknesses for the Infected.

item.title: Idle Progress
item.description:
About This Game

Idle Progress - A free idle game where your task is to produce as many resources as possible, improve your weapons and armor for good attacks, create good fishing rods for a good catch and get legendary stuff by completing legendary quests.

You can either just farm by upgrading your production or equip a weapon and armor to start fighting for better resources, better crafts and to earn the LEGENDARY ITEMS!

- Over 4 epic legendary quests to complete
- Build infrastructure with resources to increase population
- Try your self at science to create interesting creatures
- Increase your Game Skill by selling/crafting/melting stuff
- Spend some time unboxing treasures to get cool rare items
- Or you can simply relax while you are fishing

item.title: The ARMARDISP
item.description:
About This Game

Congratulations on acquiring your Articulated Mobile At-Range Demolition Integration Solutions Platform!

From a safe distance, launch projectiles at an increasingly unlikely series of constructions to bring them down. The fewer projectiles you need to do it and the more you bring down, the better you did.

Complete jobs more efficiently to unlock new areas, and become the ARMARDISP operator you have always dreamed of!

item.title: Pestilence
item.description:
About This Game

Pestilence is a first-person stealth game in which you play as the Lord of the Pestilence, a betrayed God who seeks revenge against his brothers.
To accomplish this, you will need to kill your brothers' Judges, the ruling caste of the city of Trumana. You will traverse the town's shadows as a malevolent force, using your uncanny ability to possess and sow chaos between its people.

FEATURES

Find your next host

Take advantage of your possession powers to infiltrate Trumana's souls, becoming the puppeteer of their destiny. Each citizen has access to certain locations depending on their archetype.


Infiltrate and reclaim what is yours

Experience heart-pounding stealth gameplay where you use a diverse set of abilities to outsmart your siblings' relentless followers. Create distractions with the infection, scan your surroundings with the pulse, get into hard-to-reach areas by teleporting. Combine these skills to find new ways to overcome each situation.


Find how your legacy has changed

Play as the villain and delve into the depths of Trumana's dark past, where ancient conflicts and sibling rivalries shape the present.







This game is a university project by videogame students at U-tad.

item.title: Only Up Samarkand
item.description:
About This Game

Only up Samarkand is a parkour game where speed is important.
Strive to reach the top, overcoming a variety of dynamic obstacles.
One mistake and back to the beginning...
Made in Uzbekistan

item.title: Our Dear Kingdom
item.description:
About This Game

Raise your island from a small village to a big kingdom!

Your decisions will shape the future of our dear kingdom!

You will start with an island with few resources and no buildings. Decision after decision you will have to create buildings, gather resources and manage your population!

item.title: EPIC PIZZA
item.description:
About This Game

EPIC PIZZA - The People of Calzonia are hungry for Pizza. You have to Race against Time to get it to them.

What if there was an Action/Adventure Movie about Delivering Pizzas and You Were the Star?
Well, Now You can find out!

This is a fun and challenging Race Game.
You have to Deliver Wave after Wave of Pizzas before the Clock Runs Out!

See the Game Features Below:

- Deliver Lots and Lots of Pizzas, but, Don't run out of Time!

- Get rid of a Ninja Gang!

- Enter a Race!

- Go on a Mission!

- Cool Minimap System!

- Extra Bonus Challenge: Hidden in one of the Buildings is a Special Easter Egg.
Can You Find it?

* NOTE: Don't Fall into the Water or You will have to start all over again. *

item.title: Joy Life 3
item.description:
About This Game

Game introduction

You have just joined the 100% Hotel. Joy is a popular person in the underground dance party. She is very beautiful and takes good care of you.
However, she and Ovie have a very good relationship, and they often get tired of being together, but recently, because of you, the two have begun to show signs of loosening up.
You just occasionally dance, chat, and hold hands with Joy for a drink.
"Oh, I really didn't expect Sister Ovie to be really angry..."
"...don't pay attention to her"

Gameplay

Joy Life 3 is still a casual flop game. In the game, players need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the cards on the flop are inconsistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated. When all the cards in the picture are eliminated, that is You can enter the next level!

item.title: Soulknight Survivor
item.description:
About This Game




Fight against hordes of enemies and collect their souls to gain special soulpower attacks.
Try to survive against various monsters for 30 minutes on each of the 5 challenging maps.
You can aim your weapon in all directions with your mouse or the right stick on your gamepad.
But keep your stamina in mind, each swing and dodge drains a part of it.




Level up your character with the collected souls.
Souls are not just used to fill your soulpower bar and unlock powerful attacks inside an area.
You can also use them to level up your stamina, strength, health and stamina regeneration on the long term.



Loot chests to get new weapons and armor. Enemies drop random loot chests with tasty resources and procedurally generated weapons and armor.




Mine stones and fell trees to gather resources. Craft powerful weapons and armor at the forge with the collected resources.
Increase your blacksmith skill to become a master blacksmith!



Upgrade your hometown to increase your resource storage, improve the forge and more.




  • Directional combat system
  • Soulpowers
  • Skill system
  • Resource gathering
  • Crafting system
  • Loot chests
  • 5 challenging levels with 4 difficulties each
  • Earnable medals
  • Achievements
  • Upgradable hometown

item.title: Data Garden
item.description:
About This Game

A text-less comic-game hybrid about data, interaction and digital identity. In this click & click adventure you will have a single button to advance in the story: a virtual routine of a content consumer who lives their day through different platforms that harvest their data.

This data will end up reflected in a garden, the Data Garden. A growing ecosystem where everything endures. A reflection of your digital self that knows more about you than yourself.

This is the debut game of the narrative studio Shaman Garage. They use the constrains of only using one button as input and no text to bring us this experimental story driven puzzle game. Estimated play time 10-15 minutes.

item.title: Brush Burial
item.description:
About This Game

Brush Burial is a lite immersive sim focused on atmosphere, exploration, and surreal storytelling.
You are Fennel, a lithe and limber thief with a suite of unique movement tricks and combat abilities. You are on a mission that transcends the self-serving crimes of your past--to kill the Witch God Yenneloch, and free the woods of her uncanny influence. In return, your own god has promised you a sacred rite of eternal rest. Unless you have other ideas...



FEATURES:

- abstract and non-linear levels that allow for exploration and satisfying problem-solving.

- meaningful environmental interactions--grab any object you want; play with fire; use the weapons of slain enemies against their allies.

- an expressive movement system with responsive and precise controls.

- raw but complex melee combat which rewards aggression and speed.

- grimy visuals with a dark science-fantasy slant.

- a roguish array of crooks, scoundrels, and miscreants to befriend, beguile, or otherwise.

item.title: HoloParade
item.description:
About This Game

A lively parade with hololive VTubers and mascot characters!


"HoloParade" is a fan game of hololive and the first title to serve as a test case for "holo Indie". Collect, nurture, and enjoy watching your favorite characters! It's a 2D tower defense game that offers depth, strategy, and can also be enjoyed casually.

What is "holo Indie"?:
It is a general term for a game brand for derivative work games, produced using the "game creator support program" with the aim of co-creating with fans and creators of hololive Production around the world.

Feature 1: Simple Yet Deep, Lively Battles

The basic system is a classic 2D tower defense game where you summon characters from your base and march them forward to destroy the enemy's base to win. While the controls are simple, the gameplay is profoundly deep. With over 65 characters, each possessing a variety of abilities like ally healing support and self-destruct attacks, skillful combination and flexible formation are key to enjoying the game.

Additionally, there's an element inspired by parades called the 'Symphony Effect,' where various effects are activated based on the musical instruments played by the characters in march. This adds further strategic depth to the formation of your parade squad and the order of their summoning.

Feature 2: Comprehensive Development Elements

In addition to leveling up and limit breaking, there is a 'Skill' system that allows you to add special abilities not available through regular development. Since you can add up to three types of skills to each character and select them carefully, you can enjoy a unique development process! Furthermore, since you can reset levels and get a full refund of the coins spent, it allows for more freedom in restructuring formations and character development.

Feature 3: No Gacha Purchases, No Stamina System

The scout gacha, which allows you to acquire characters, can be used by consuming tickets obtained within the game, with no additional purchases required. Also, as there is no stamina system, you are not bound by time and can play as much as you like, whenever you like.

Moreover, the scout gacha allows you to choose from two randomly selected character candidates, enabling players to make selections based on their strategy or preference rather than leaving it entirely to chance.

Feature 4: Take a Break with Various Talents and Mini-Games in the Office

When you return to the office, the home screen, you'll be greeted by newly recorded voice lines from Harusaki Nodoka, a staff member of hololive. In the office, talents from hololive may also make appearances, and you might witness some unexpected interactions.


Additionally, mini-games with entirely different gameplay from the main story are implemented. These games allow you to collect coins necessary for character strengthening. At the initial release, a mini-game titled "Hurry Up! Miko-Chi!" is available, where Sakura Miko (a VTuber affiliated with hololive) who overslept, dashes at full speed towards her destination while avoiding obstacles. More mini-games are planned to be added in future updates.

item.title: XBPlay
item.description:
About This Software

Experience gaming freedom like never before with XBPlay — effortlessly stream your console to your device and immerse yourself in your favorite titles anytime, anywhere.

Features:
- 1080p and 720p Stream Quality.
- Multiple Clarity Boost Algorithms.
- Simulated and Direct Mouse and Keyboard Support.
- Connected Controllers and Touch Input.
- Many Customizable Settings.

item.title: Age of Advent
item.description:
About This Game

This is a free unofficial fangame based on the members of Hololive -Advent-

WELCOME TO THE AGE OF ADVENT!


Play four minigames based on the members of Hololive -Advent-!

Bijem'd


The pickaxes are coming! Help the Moai escape before they get here! Clear the path to the bottom by clicking on groups of matching colors, and rack up combos by saving groups of Moai quickly!

The Demon Of Sound and Soup


Is a dance club the best place to make a demonic soup? Maybe not, but it's close enough to a kitchen for Nerissa! Move to the beat of the music and round up partygoers ingredients. Get the conga line as big as you can, then drop them off in Nerissa's pot! And watch out for the F-bombs. Someone really needs to watch their language...

We're Abaubaut to Crash!


Fuwawa and Mococo can't find the brakes! Control both of them at the same time in this multitasking infinite minecart level. Collect gems, avoid pits, bonk Pero, and work together to last as long as you can as the track keeps getting faster and more dangerous!

Archival Survival


Farming in the middle of the night? Do plants usually sprout books? Why couldn't they put the seeds next to the water? Well, nevertheless, plant and harvest as many crops as you can tonight. And remember: DON'T. LET. THEM. SEE. YOU.

item.title: Hidden Cats In Amusement Park
item.description:
About This Game


This is a casual and relaxing hidden object game.
Find cute cats in the amusement park.Can you find them?
That's right，there are a few on the carousel.
Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！



· Hand drawn cartoon minimalist style
· More than 600 Cats
· With different postures and expressions
· Explore the entire amusement park
· Some interesting interactive elements
· Drag and zoom the screen view
· Relax and find all the cats

item.title: Pen Pals
item.description:
About This Game

Things are going HAYwire down at the farm! Corral a herd of particularly round barnyard friends back into the pen. When two matching animals bump into each other, you'll find an even larger animal in their place. Things get crowded quickly, so get a mooove on in Pen Pals!

  • Over a dozen different stages, with unique looks and wacky changes to the game!
  • Chain your merges to score extra points. Rack up that combo and impress those animals!
  • Three target scores to beat for each level. Go for the gold!
  • At least ten adorably round barnyard friends, plus one very judgmental donkey
  • Unlock secret goodies as you play! What mysteries await you?

item.title: Cloud Castle
item.description:
About This Game

《Cloud Castle》It is a strategic tower defense game that builds your defense route by placing and upgrading on a grid map, resisting waves of monsters.

Map - a battle scene constructed from stylized plots, using turrets to plan the monster's path

Ores - There are a small number of special ore parcels in each map that can be collected by placing mining caves

Talent - Every battle will accumulate experience and increase levels, and each level will receive talent points that can be used to unlock more turrets and additional bonuses

Enhancement - Using the collected minerals to strengthen your turret can allow you to achieve higher limits in combat

item.title: Chaperone
item.description:
About This Game

WARNING: This game may trigger seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy. It may cause heart palpitations. It is left to the player's discretion.

"HOW MUCH PATIENCE MAY REQUIRE TO COMPANY A DEAD BODY?"

IMPORTANT NOTE: The game focuses on exploration and slowly builds tension to create a deeper and more meaningful experience. The story of the game can cause a lot of discomfort as it is supported by light, loud and sudden sounds. Take into consideration that it makes you feel a lot of fear and it is a psychologically difficult game.
CHAPERONE is a first-person psychological horror game.

Environment
In the game where we start our duty as a police officer, the police house consists of two different houses that we will later investigate.

About The Game
In this game, inspired by real events in 2001, your aim is to solve a murder whose cause is unknown, become a companion for the body found in the house at the time, and reach the truth that disturbs the dead body.

Supernatural entities
Paranormal entities that are constantly unknown where and when they will appear.

Developer's comment about the game
Chaperone can leave an impact on your psychology. We recommend that people who are afraid of the dark, have heart disease, or are afraid of being alone should not play alone.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Chaperone was inspired by a real event that took place in Munich, Germany in 2001. If research is done, you can still find issues similar to this story today...

item.title: Apocalypse Party
item.description:
About This Game

The moment of "Apocalypse" approaches, this time... ...you fight for yourself!


「Apocalypse Party」 is distinct from the former 「Project Zero」
In this installment, you will delve deeper into this long-standing battle, with the story gradually becoming incredible! Time travel? Apocalypse? Saving the world? You will face many more unknown challenges... ...
But it still retains our beloved RogueLike + mowing-down-enemies combo, and you will face this catastrophe online with your friends (of course, you can also face it alone)!

■ Engaging and Deep Mechanics ■




Talent pool expanded to 450! And most of them are mechanics that can change the course of battle
Additionally, there are:
- Hundreds of distinct ranged and melee weapons!
- A plethora of divine ultimate skills!
- 35 varied hero characters, hundreds of unique hero skills
The richness has increased by more than 10 times compared to the former installment! Can you build the strongest combo?

■ Supports Multiplayer, shall we join the hunting party tonight? ■




Support up to 3 multiplayer online!
Massive hordes of zombies, exhilarating mowing-down action, why enjoy it alone?
Imagine the joy of roaming through a sea of zombies with your friends!
Call them, support each other, move forward or retreat together, survive here!
Of course, we kindly remind you, a "friendship-ends" scenario is not excluded :)

■ You crave some real challenge, don't you? ■




In this game, you will face the ultimate challenge.
9 highly challenging Bosses!
Only rapid growth can help you withstand the fierce attacks from the Bosses, accept the challenge, defeat them, and show them who’s boss now!

■ Perhaps we can do some time traveling! ■




A brand new storyline takes you into this familiar yet strange world, continuing a tale of redemption amidst time traveling:
The tragic death of loved ones
The desperate nuclear explosion
The eerie rebirth
The deathly quiet town
The dark dungeons
... ...

■ We are continuously focusing on your gameplay experience! ■




We have keenly listened to the feedback from the players of our former installment, reworked the combat system of the game, continuously bringing more fluid gaming experiences to players.
-Mix and use combat methods like melee weapons, firearms, spells, summoning, witchcraft... ...! They will bring you a fun experience.
-Drive vehicles, summon planes, dragon flying, use otherworldly ninjutsu, even use the mysterious Dual-vector Foi, and more easter eggs await your exploration.
-This game encourages an online experience, but undoubtedly, the single-player part can still experience all the systems and joy of this game.

Smooth operation (handling) is also an important part we continuously focus on！
We have made the game’s operation & flow experience more user-friendly.
Easy to get started, yet "easy to learn, hard to master"!

"Since the apocalypse is here, join us for the last revelry."

item.title: Yeah! Wow! Hey!
item.description:
About This Game

Tired of endless climbing? Congratulation you have a new option! This is a high difficulty 3D platform jumping game. The high demand for directional control coupled with minimal room for error makes for more challenging levels. Reaching the top is no easy task.Don't expect any edge climbing to give you any hope to survive, in this game, there are no such lucky ways. All you can do is move, jump, and sprint.

Sounds simple, right? Different from traditional platform jumping games, the control of the view plays a crucial role. The view is closely related to each of your operations and determines your moving direction, sprinting direction, and bouncing or propelling direction. I bet no one has ever thought of playing a platform jumping game like a FPS, relying on precise mouse movement. In addition to this, traditional platform jumping games require precision in timing jumps, avoiding moving obstacles, and taking advantage of sprint distance and direction in order to reach the next platform. These features are all emphasized in this game. Fully utilizing special surfaces for bouncing or propelling is your only way to reach the other side.

Do these blue and green bubbles remind you of another widely acclaimed game? That's right, feel the challenge in a 3D environment, an extension of a dimension. The level is full of various usable mechanisms, so don't rush to take your steps. Carefully observe and judge, taking advantage of these mechanisms, or even shortcuts, are essential for masters.

Don't worry, not that cruel. The game has checkpoints, but not saves. A little mistake will only cost a bit of time. What, you just want to show off having the shortest time? Well, never mind. Take it from me, a true champion who jumps to the top in one breath does not need the lifeboat of saves.
As for the game graphics...what can I say...the trailer and screenshots are hanging right there above.

Supports up to 8 players online（maybe more in the future）, will you regard others as competitors or partners? I believe everyone will have a different answer.

Enjoy!

item.title: Bronzebeard's Tavern
item.description:
About This Game

Bronzebeard's Tavern is a goofy and playful restaurant manager sim where 1-4 players can work as a team with multiplayer co-op. Fulfill a number of different roles, serve a diverse range of customers and cook up delicious dwarven cuisine.

4-Player Multiplayer!

Work together (or try) to keep the tavern running for as long as you can with three other dwarves in online multiplayer.

Serve Customers!

Properly manage customer seating and orders and deliver them the correct foods to reap rewards!

Cook Up and Blend Delicious Food and Drink!

Prepare food for the customers upon receiving orders from your teammates, being careful not to burn anything!

Customize your Menu!

Your daily customers are always different! Design your menu however you like based on the day's forecast and food sales!

Many Customers to Discover!

There's always an unfamiliar face showing up when you're working in a tavern... can you satisfy them all?

Upgrade your Tavern!

Build up your tavern with upgrades! These decisions change the way you play and are crucial for progressing into tougher days. Opt for more customer capacity with a shiny new expansion or utilities like more blenders or more stoves to increase your output!

item.title: MoeMoni Land
item.description:
About This Game

This game tells the story of the creepy great demons from the "Night Parade of One Hundred Demons"... having a happy childhood?!
Hey there! Just how adorable can young monster forms be? In "Monster Tot Kindergarten," you can see the young forms of 21 well-known monsters like Tengu, Shuten Doji, Tamamo no Mae, and more. They possess incredible skills yet have their own unique quirks. You and your friends can play as these little monsters and put on a thrilling and fun social deduction drama.


"MoeMoni Land" is a social deduction game with a gameplay foundation based on deduction. It blends a Japanese-style world of monsters and folklore, creating a system with three camps: "students," "demons," and "neutrals." You can choose from 21 adorable little monster characters, each with 17 different talented professions, making the already suspenseful school more strategic. Play with 6-12 players online, complete mission goals with your friends from the same camp, and strive for victory together!

◆ 21 Super Popular Cute Monsters ◆

21 incredibly popular monster kids, transformed into adorable, chibi-style kindergarten children. Each little monster has unique skills with gorgeous interactive effects when using their abilities.

◆ Explore Diverse and Fun Missions ◆

Throughout the game, there are creative mini-games to discover, which can be triggered as little monster characters. These mini-games are full of creative fun and are incredibly engaging.

◆ Students or Demons - Three Major Camps ◆

Students, demons, and neutrals, three major camps with a gathering of experts! Will you be a righteous student, a sly little villain, or a mischievous prankster? It's your choice!

◆ Righteous or Sly - Various Professions ◆

With 17 different professions, initiate the most exciting deduction party. Win as you like, start a meeting with a single tap, and the rest depends on your fantastic acting skills!

◆ Text or Voice - Two-way Discussion ◆

The game supports both voice and text discussions, offering diverse social gameplay options. Overcome social anxiety in an instant!


⚑ Scan to follow Monster Tot Kindergarten's official Bilibili & Weibo accounts for the latest information ⚑

item.title: Stimmings
item.description:
About This Game

A strategic rouge like simulation in the fantasy genre.
Lead your villagers 'Stimmings' against the relentless forces of entropy in this cellular automata simulation where the parameters of the sim are altered every run.

The only resource you have are your villagers, and each villager takes up a cell in the simulation.
Due to unfortunate medical circumstances, the villagers are required to be stimming themselves at all times and they cannot stop moving.

Build up your Stimmings and defend them against the enemies and work towards a limited number of castles on the map.

Defeat each Legendary Opponent in these castles to obtain relics that will be vital for survivial in the next levels.

If you find a portal squeeze as many Stimmings inside as you can to ensure the next round is not impossible to navigate.

You the player usually end up balancing your home economy with refreshing farms, navigating environmental hazards, and the offensive required to overtake an enemy structure.

If you find the modern world unstimulating and consider yourself completely desensitized to any information coming from a screen and speakers, this game is for you. Designed to swallow hours of your day and being left with no real recollection of what happened or where you are at the end of rounds.



  • Procedural map generation from one of three biomes determines the initial land scape and resource/hazards locations
  • Every map has a portal that requires a certain amount of your Stimmings to activate (this generates the next level)
  • Stimmings (villagers) throw themselves onto blueprints you place to create structures that can span many squares
  • Unique relics provide relief in tight or stressful spots
  • Get to level 10!
  • Stim!
  • MAINTAIN SANITY
